name: Magical Dinosaur Tour
summary: You're exploring a primeval forest over 100 million years ago. Suddenly, the mighty Tyrannosaurus appears! With a push of a button, you bring him to life! The magic of TurboGrafx-CD brings the exciting world of dinosaurs into your home. Move through 20 prehistoric panoramas and watch creatures spring into action as they search for food and struggle for survival. Sort through hundreds of the mighty beasts and see what may have led to their ultimate extinction.
